course_title: Fresh Sem: Music: Mus/Myth - Wagner's Ring Cycle
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 15 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only)
(This course will explore the four operas of Wagner's Ring cycle, focusing on the musical and dramatic structure, the origins of the story in Norse mythology, and contemporary reinterpretations of the drama.  The course will also consider ethical aspects of the relation of the Wagner and his works to the mores of his own time and those of today.)
course_description: Fulfills the freshman seminar requirement of the General Education Requirements. A variety of courses covering a wide range of topics in music. Refer to the Music Department website for a listing of classes currently offered.
sections: Class Nbr: 1587, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: M. Cox, Status: Open
